text:
Perindustrian 2014-2016 Saleh Husin, dan artis Raffi Ahmad. Juga hadir perwakilan Kadin provinsi
dan kabupaten/kota.
Hashim mengawali pidatonya dengan menekankan, secara umum kebijakan ekonomi Prabowo
berada di titik tengah antara kapitalisme dan sosialisme. Menurut dia, Prabowo itu pro-pengusaha
sekaligus pro-rakyat. ”Ini tidak ada benturan. Kita pengusaha cari cuan dengan cara terhormatlah.
Bayar pajak. Patuhi dan jaga lingkungan hidup. Buat yang bermanfaat bagi seluruh Indonesia,” ujar
Hashim yang juga Wakil Ketua Dewan Pembina Partai Gerindra itu. Hashim Djojohadikusomo
membeberkan rencana kebijakan ekonomi era Prabowo di diskusi Kamar Dagang dan Industri
(Kadin) Indonesia, di Menara Kadin, Jakarta, Senin (7/10/2024). Ia menjelaskan, salah satu
kebijakan utama pemerintahan Prabowo adalah memberikan makanan gratis pagi dan siang
kepada total 82 juta penduduk. Adapun mereka adalah anak sekolah, anak di rumah, serta ibu hamil.
Menurut dia, Prabowo tidak tiba-tiba saja terpikirkan makan siang itu karena kampanye Pemilu 2024,
tetapi sudah terpikirkan sejak 2006 lalu. Saat itu, Prabowo membaca laporan harian Kompas yang
mengutip data Kementerian Kesehatan bahwa jumlah anak tengkes atau stunting pada usia balita
mencapai 30 persen. Hal itu karena mereka kekurangan gizi yang optimal dalam masa
trans:
Industry 2014-2016 Saleh Husin, and a celebrity Raffi Ahmad were also present as the representatives of the provincial and regency/city
Chamber of Commerce and Industry
Hashim began his speech by encompassing that in general Prabowo's economic policies
are in the middle between capitalism and socialism. He said that Prabowo is pro-entrepreneur
and pro-people. "There is no conflict. We, entrepreneurs, should make money in an honorable way.
Pay taxes. Obey and protect the environment. Create something that is beneficial for Indonesia," he said.
Hashim is also the deputy chairman of the advisory board of the Gerindra Party. Hashim Djojohadikusomo
revealed the economic policy plans of the Prabowo era in a discussion at the Chamber of Commerce and Industry
(Kadin) Indonesia, at the Kadin Tower, Jakarta, Monday (10/7/2024). He explained, one of
the main policies of the Prabowo government is to give free meal for breakfast and lunch
to a total of 82 million people. They are school children, children at home, and pregnant women.
According to him, the free lunch was not a last-minute idea proposed by Prabowo because of the 2024 election campaign,
but it had been on his mind since 2006. At that time, Prabowo read a Kompas daily report which
quoted data from the Ministry of Health that the number of stunted toddlers
reached 30 percent. That is because they lack optimal nutrition during
